item.title: Update humio logging limit per day
item.description: https://www.humio.com/ - Free up to 16 GB/day with 7 days retention

item.title: Update README.md
item.description: https://onlineornot.com/) - OnlineOrNot is a reliable uptime monitor for both JS-based web apps and websites. 5 uptime checks (for static websites and APIs) with a 5 minute interval, 1 browser check with a 15 minute interval. Also provides automated public status pages (with support coming for 3rd party uptime monitoring - OnlineOrNot is a reliable uptime monitor for both JS-based web apps and websites. 5 uptime checks (for static websites and APIs) with a 5 minute interval, 1 browser check with a 15 minute interval. Also provides automated public status pages (with support coming for 3rd party uptime monitoring). Free for up to 3 users, alerts via Slack, Discord, and Email.

item.title: Update README.md
item.description: https://www.quidlo.com/timesheets - - A simple timesheet and time tracking app for teams. Free plan has time tracking and generating reports features, it is available for up to 10 users.

item.title: removing runs-on.tech from free domain as repo archived
update railway free plan quota
item.description: https://railway.app - Railway is an infrastructure platform where you can provision infrastructure, develop with that infrastructure locally, and then deploy to the cloud. 1GB Disk, 512 MB RAM, limited to $5 or 500 hours of usage monthly available for free.

item.title: add cronit app
item.description: https://cronit.app - Online cronjobs service. Free plan includes 100 job execution per month

item.title: Add DBaaS: filess.io
item.description: https://filess.io - filess.io is a platform where you can create upto 5 databases of the following DBMS for free: MySQL, MariaDB, MongoDB, PostreSQL.
